pr_title: fix: Block writer thread if response output buffer is full

timeline.message: fix: block on write if write queue full

timeline.bodyText: Should we add a more informative error message?
timeline.author: vcrfxia

replies.bodyText: The wrapped exception should contain the important error messages. I don't usually like adding new messages on rethrows unless you're doing something extra.
replies.author: purplefox

timeline.bodyText: Should we check explicitly for TimeoutException? Since we don't expect ExecutionException to be thrown here.
timeline.author: vcrfxia

replies.bodyText: We could, but I don't think it adds much as we want to rethrow on any exception we receive.
replies.author: purplefox

timeline.bodyText: ResponseOutputStream is only written to by a single thread anyway, right? (Trying to check my understanding.)
timeline.author: vcrfxia

replies.bodyText: Yes, but it's a sanity check.
replies.author: purplefox
